name: 13 JPEG vs RAW: The Key Differences: A Guide for Beginners
description: JPEG vs RAW, made simple: when to choose each, key pros and cons, and editing tips. Grab the free 1-page checklist for quick decisions and better results.

step.name: Prepare equipment
step.text: Prepare your camera equipment and any necessary accessories for the photography technique described in this article.

step.name: Evaluate scene and lighting
step.text: Evaluate the scene and lighting conditions to determine the best approach for capturing the images.

step.name: Apply technique
step.text: Apply the photography technique described in the article, following the guidance and recommendations provided.

step.name: Capture images
step.text: Capture images following the advice and tips outlined in the post, adjusting settings as needed.

step.name: Review and refine
step.text: Review your captured images and refine your technique based on the results and feedback from the article.
